fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Repress your hunger tonight. Your defense will be lowered to None, and you will not attack anyone who visits you tonight. (3 uses)
- Lure a target tonight, redirecting them to you. (1 use)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Control and roleblock immune.
- You will indiscriminately attack anyone who visits you at night. On Night 6, you will be worn out, removing this attribute and your Basic defense.
